name: Tux Platformer
description:
This is my first attempt at developing a actual playable game. Its inspired by SuperTux.

The only art assets that are not done by myself is the background, and the main character Tux.

Currently it is just a demo scene, where you can jump around, jump on slimes, throw snowballs by clicking enter or R2 on controller.

Controls

Keyboard: (A = Left ) (D Right) (Space = Jump ) (Shift = Glide) (Enter = Throw Snowball) (Esc = Quit) (Backspace = Restart after death)

Also Supports Gamepads
